collectible.title: G&K Business Card
collectible.subtitle: GRIFFIN AND KRYUGER PRIVATE MILITARY CONTRACTOR
collectible.text:
A business card with a fierce-looking war veteran on the front. Emblazened at the top is a rough, futuristic looking emblem and the company's name in a equally fancy font. After the game finished, PA-15 slid this into your palm, saying to "make a request for Florence" next time you want to invite her to one of these games.
You might do just that.
